name: storageify
author: Daniel Lopes <lopsch@googlemail.com>
description: Store/read Cycle.js state (from Cycle.js onionify) in/from HTML5 Local Storage

scripts.test: rm -rf mochawesome && mocha --colors --require babel-register --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=index,reportDir=mochawesome,quiet=false,enableCode=false test/**/*all.js
scripts.cover: rm -rf istanbul && export BABEL_ENV=coverage && npm run build:cover && unset BABEL_ENV && npm run test:cover && npm run cover:check
scripts.build:cover: rm -rf lib && export NODE_ENV=development && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf lib && export NODE_ENV=development && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js -w
scripts.build:ci: npm run clean && npm run cover && npm run build && npm run test && npm run doc
scripts.build: rm -rf lib stats && mkdir stats && export NODE_ENV=production && rollup -c rollup.config.prod.js
scripts.fix: prettier --write --print-width 80 --tab-width 2 --no-semi --single-quote --trailing-comma none --jsx-bracket-same-line --parser babylon src/**/*.js test/**/*.js && eslint --fix src/**/*.js test/**/*.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf istanbul jsdoc lib mochawesome stats
